comment: During this time my body builds immunity and I received my second dose and weeks following I will continue to wear a mask and practice social distancing until my body has built up immunity. Today is a good day my friends. I am happy I live in a time when science can prevail.

            :time (a3 / and

            :op2 (f / follow-01

                  :ARG2 r

      :snt2 (s2 / say-01
            :ARG1 (d3 / day
                  :ARG1-of (g / good-02)
                  :domain (t2 / today))
            :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91

                        :ARG2 (f2 / friend))))
      :snt3 (h2 / happy-01
            :ARG0 (l / live-01
                  :ARG0 ii4

                        :ARG1-of (p4 / possible-01)))
            :ARG1 ii4))
